name: Industrianst√§llda i Norden
goal: We gather together 19 Trade Unions in all Nordic countries. These Unions represent more than one million  members working in different blue collar, white collar or academic professions within industry. Nordic IN's task is to promote common interests of its affiliated Unions and act as a link to spreding information to the Unions.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, International co-operation and development, Trade
euInitiatives: Trade policy (trade agreements, promoting free and fair trade). Brexit. Policies concerning EWC. Policies related to labour markets.
